attributes.description:
Welcome to Auto Investments, where we sell reliable cars in all price ranges.
We aim to provide you with exceptional service, sound financial advice and affordable quality. 
All our customers can expect the very highest standards of sales and service excellence. 
Visit our Full Range of vehicles at www.autoi.co.za
Please note, advertised sales prices does not include License and Registration fees, nor Dealer Admin Fees.

2013 MERCEDES-BENZ VIANO, 169727 KM, BLACK with BLACK.

44095060

You should feel good with at least 75% of tire wear left on this set of rubber.

attributes.description: We at KIA RANDBURG pride ourselves on delivering quality used vehicles to our clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125 quality point check,  DEKRA roadworthy and valet before being displayed on our showroom floor. All vehicles are delivered with a full service history and are accident free. We believe in EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. We will tailor make a DEAL that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too. We have In-House finance options with all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly assist you in making your dreams come TRUE.

attributes.title: 2022 Kia Picanto 1.0 Street

attributes.description:
At Kia Alberton, we pride ourselves on delivering high quality pre-owned vehicles. All our vehicles undergo a thorough 125-point quality check, roadworthy and valet.  

The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Alberton Family and family look after each other. We will structure a package that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too.   

Call now and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you to our showroom to view and test drive the vehicle. 

Finance can be arranged through all major financial institutions, nationwide delivery available and all trade-ins accepted subject to view. Price excludes on the road fees.

We can offer you the best finance options to suit your needs. No need to sell your car privately, we offer fair and transparent trade in prices.
